# Suggested GitHub labels for refactor work

Use these labels in the repository to organize work and PRs during the refactor.
You can create them in your GitHub repo settings or via automation.

- refactor — code refactor work (color: 0e8a16)
- docs — documentation changes (color: 0075ca)
- test — test additions/changes (color: fbca04)
- bug — bug fix (color: d73a4a)
- enhancement — new feature or improvement (color: a2eeef)
- chore — maintenance (color: cfd3d7)
- discussion — needs design/implementation discussion (color: 5319e7)
- help wanted — asking for external help (color: 008672)
